title: Marak
description: She wanted vengeance. He didn't want a wife. One bite changed everything…Maria Ravensford is a woman on a mission. A mission of vengeance. Determined to avenge the death of her young sister at the hands of Rogue vampires, the petite Dhampir takes to the streets to hunt them.Unfortunately things don't go precisely to plan and it's only the arrival of Marak, a darkly handsome vampire Warrior, that saves her life. Trouble is, the bite that saves her life also takes her fully into the world of the Kyn…where Marak is waiting to claim her.Publisher’s This book was previously released with another publisher under the title "Dark Embrace".
author: Mina Carter
